price: ߝߏ߫ ߡߍ߲ ( ߞߐߢߌ߬ߣߊ ) ߓߊ߯ ߊߟߊ߫ ߘߌߦߊ߫ ߸ ߓߊ ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߞߊ߬ ߟߊ߲ߞߣߍߡߊ ߟߐ߲߫ ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߦߋ߫ ߘߏ߲߰ ߠߊ߫
arabic: إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ يَعۡلَمُ ٱلۡجَهۡرَ وَمَا يَخۡفَىٰ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: illā mā shāa al-lahu innahu yaʿlamu al-jahra wamā yakhfā
